name: Aerolink Flight Academy
about: Aerolink Flight Academy is a premier flight training institution dedicated to producing highly skilled and safety-conscious pilots. Established with a commitment to excellence, our academy offers a comprehensive range of programs from private pilot licenses to commercial aviation certifications. Our state-of-the-art facilities, modern fleet, and experienced instructors ensure a rigorous and supportive learning environment. We prioritize individualized attention and flexible scheduling to accommodate diverse student needs. With a strong focus on safety, professionalism, and continuous improvement, Aerolink Flight Academy is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a successful aviation career. We are proud to be a trusted name in flight education.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
